name: Voodoo Mechanic
description:
As a traveling mechanic, your job is to fix various machines for companies doing whatever they need. Your skills are marveled by engineers around the globe at your techniques as every machine you've set out to fix has come out marvelous!
"How do you do it? It's practically better than before!"

Voodoo magic. Tag teaming with a voodoo doll of yourself, you work together inside and out to repair any sort of machine, your voodoo doll going inside to do delicate procedures that would be much too difficult and intrusive to do normally.

Controls:

Click - interact

mouse scroll - interact with dials

Q - switch between mechanic and doll view

Credits:

Gwendolyn Krezel (Pandaik) - Programming

Ethan Troxell (tikicat6) - Music, Level Design

Mason Davis (Rhinosaur) - 3d Modelling, Art
